get.description: Gets a paginated list of games.
Gets a single game by its ID.
Gets the box score for a game by its ID.
Gets a collection of goalie game logs.
Gets a paginated list of goalie statistics.
Gets a paginated list of info guides.
Gets a single info guide by its ID.
Gets an info guide by tournament ID.
Gets a paginated list of players.
Gets a single player by its ID.
Gets a collection of skater game logs.
Gets a paginated list of skater statistics.
Gets a paginated list of teams.
Gets a single team by its ID.
Gets a paginated list of tournaments.
Gets a single tournament by its ID.
